description:
From our office in Allentown, Pennsylvania, the attorneys at Kitay Law Offices provide exceptional representation to clients throughout Lehigh County and beyond who are dealing with complex, pressing legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Personal injury and wrongful death
  • Car crashes and other motor vehicle accidents
  • Workers' compensation
  • Criminal defense
  • DUI defense
  • Immigration law

Over the past 25 years of our law firm's existence, we have grown to include six total offices in Pennsylvania. Our lawyers have been featured on various local and national news programs as well as online outlets, where they have offered in-depth legal commentary on a variety of topics.

This means that you can expect to receive the highest level of counsel and support directly from a local attorney who has your best interests at heart. What's more, our lawyers have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from their peers along with numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

We offer full bilingual services in English and Spanish, so we can communicate directly with our Latino and Hispanic clientele. This has helped make us one of our region's leading full-service law firms, and you can rely on us to help you achieve your goals and the favorable outcomes you expect and deserve as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.

For more information about how we can best serve your needs here at Kitay Law Offices, we invite you to call us or visit our website to schedule a free initial consultation. We also currently offer virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you and your family safe and healthy.
